verses.plain: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,

tokens.t: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,

verses.plain: To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.

tokens.t: To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers,
gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.

verses.plain: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.

tokens.t: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful,

verses.plain: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,

tokens.t: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,

verses.plain: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

tokens.t: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

verses.plain: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

tokens.t: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

verses.plain: That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.

tokens.t: That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.

verses.plain: This is a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.

tokens.t: a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.

verses.plain: But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.

tokens.t: But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.

verses.plain: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;

tokens.t: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;

verses.plain: Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.

tokens.t: Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.

verses.plain: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.

tokens.t: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.

verses.plain: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.

tokens.t: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.

verses.plain: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.

tokens.t: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.

verses.plain: All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen.

tokens.t: All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace
